trtoolbox.myglobalfit module¶

trtoolbox.myglobalfit.calculate_estimate(das, data)[source]¶

Computes contributions of DAS in the raw data.

Parameters

  • das (np.array) – DAS

  • data (np.array) – Data matrix.

Returns

est – Contributions of the individual DAS.

Return type

np.array

trtoolbox.myglobalfit.create_profile(time, ks)[source]¶

Computes a concentration profile according to the model() function.

Parameters

  • time (np.array) – Time array.

  • ks (np.array) – Decay rate constants for each species.

Returns

profile – Concentration profile matrix.

Return type

np.array

trtoolbox.myglobalfit.create_tr(par, time)[source]¶

Function returning exponential time traces for a given set of parameters.

Parameters

  • par (np.array) – Parameter matrix. Last column contains rate constants. Remaining columns are prefactors (rate constants x SVD components)

  • time (np.array) – Time array.

Returns

profile – Concentration profile matrix.

Return type

np.array

trtoolbox.myglobalfit.doglobalfit(time, wn, data, tcs, method='svd', svds=5, offset=False)[source]¶

Wrapper for global fit routine.

Parameters

  • time (np.array) – Time array.

  • wn (np.array) – Frequency array.

  • data (np.array) – Raw data matrix.

  • tcs (np.array) – Initial time constants

  • method (np.array) – Method for global fitting. raw for fitting the residuals of fitted data and input data, est for fitting the residuals between concentration profile and contributions of DAS, svd for fitting the SVD time traces (default).

  • svd (int) – Number of SVD components to be fitted. Default: 5

  • offset (boolean) – Considering the last spectrum to be an offset. Default: False

Returns

gf_res – Results objects.

Return type

myglobalfit.results()

trtoolbox.myglobalfit.model(S, time, ks)[source]¶

Creates an array of differential equations according to a unidirectional sequential exponential model. S[0]/dt = -k0*S[0] S[1]/dt = k0*S[0] - k1*S[1] S[2]/dt = k1*S[1] - k2*S[2] and so on

Parameters

  • S (np.array) – Starting concentrations for each species.

  • time (np.array) – Time array.

  • ks (np.array) – Decay rate constants for each species.

Returns

arr – Array containing the differential equations.

Return type

np.array

trtoolbox.myglobalfit.opt_func_est(ks, time, data)[source]¶

Optimization function for residuals of concentration profile and estimated contributions of DAS :param ks: Rate constants :type ks: np.array :param time: Time array. :type time: np.array :param data: Data matrix. :type data: np.array

Returns

R – Flattened array of residuals.

Return type

np.array

trtoolbox.myglobalfit.opt_func_raw(ks, time, data)[source]¶

Optimization function for residuals of fitted data - input data.

  • time (np.array) – Time array.

  • data (np.array) – Data matrix.

Returns

trtoolbox.myglobalfit.opt_func_svd(par, time, data, svdtraces, nb_exps)[source]¶

Optimization function for residuals of SVD abstract time traces - fitted traces.

Parameters

  • par (np.array) – Flattened parameter array

  • time (np.array) – Time array.

  • data (np.array) – Data matrix.

  • svdtraces (np.array) – SVD traces

  • nb_exps (int) – Number of exponential decay processes. Needed for reshaping the flattened paramater array

Returns

R – Flattened array of residuals.

Return type

np.array

class trtoolbox.myglobalfit.results[source]¶

Bases: object

Object containing fit results.

data¶

Data matrix subjected to fitting.

Type

np.array

time¶

Time array.

Type

np.array

wn¶

Wavenumber array.

Type

np.array

offset¶

Default is ‘no’.

Type

str

spectral_offset¶

optional if offset was chosen

Type

np.array

method¶

Chosen method (default is ‘svd’).

Type

str

ks¶

Rate constants obtained by fitting.

Type

np.array

var¶

Variance of the rate constants.

Type

np.array

tcs¶

Time constants obtained by fitting.

Type

np.array

das¶

Decay associated spectra.

Type

np.array

profile¶

Concentration profile determined by ks

Type

np.array

estimates¶

Contribution of das to the dataset for each datapoint.

Type

np.array

fitdata¶

Fitted dataset.

Type

np.array

fittraces¶

optional if method=’svd’ was chosen. Fitted abstract time traces.

Type

np.array

print_results()[source]¶

Prints time constants.

show_results()[source]¶

Plots the concentration profile, DAS, fitted data and fitted abstract time traces if method=’svd’ was chosen.

trtoolbox.mysvd.dosvd(data)[source]¶

Simple wrapper for the scipy.linalg.svd() function.

Parameters

data (np.array) – Data matrix subjected to SVD. Assuming m x n with m as frequency and n as time. But it is actually not important.

Returns

  • u (np.array) – U matrix. Represents abstract spectra

  • s (np.array) – Singular values.

  • vt (np.array) – Transposed V matrix. Represents abstract time traces.

trtoolbox.mysvd.reconstruct(data, n=0)[source]¶

Reconstructs data with n singular components.

Parameters

data (np.array) – Data matrix subjected to SVD. Assuming m x n with m as frequency and n as time. But it is actually not important.

Returns

res – Results object.

Return type

mysvd.results()
